T02D2359:7a-1: ji ltar bltas pa de ltar mthong ba med //
T02D2359:7a-2: brdzun pa med pa'i slu ba 'ba' zhig ste //
T02D2359:7a-3: bsam mi khyab cing grub smra he ru ba //
T02D2359:7a-4: skyob pa'i sems kyis rang bzhin gzugs mi shes //
T02D2359:7a-5: ji ltar de ltar glo bur gang la bzhag /'dod
T02D2359:7a-6: pa'i mdung gis rang la ci ste zug / bsam
T02D2359:7a-7: mi khyab cing grub smra he ru pa //
T02D2359:7a-8: skyob pa'i sems kyis rang bzhin gzugs mi shes //
T02D2359:7a-9: lhan cig sems te mkha' lus bde snying lus //
T02D2359:7a-10: gnyis med gnyis yin stong dang snying rje'i sems //
T02D2359:7a-11: bsam gyis mi khyab grub smra he ru ba //
T02D2359:7a-12: skyob pa'i sems kyis rang bzhin gzugs mi shes //
T02D2359:7a-13: de ni mi skye mi 'gag rkyen med de //
T02D2359:7a-14: rang bzhin rtogs na rtsa ba'i sems shes yin //
T02D2359:7a-15: bsam gyis mi khyab grub smra he ru pa //
T02D2359:7a-16: skyob pa'i sems kyis rang bzhin gzugs mi shes //
